control_attributes.control_description: The organization: a. Requires personnel to report suspected security incidents to the organizational incident response capability within [Assignment: organization-defined time period]; andb. Reports security incident information to [Assignment: organization-defined authorities

Control Statement: The organization: a. Requires personnel to report suspected security incidents to the organizational incident response capability within [Assignment: organization-defined time period]; andb. Reports security incident information to [Assignment: organization-defined authorities
